title: How to Get Unlimited Money in Clash of Clans

steps.headline: Go to settings and go on Wi-fi and click the blue i button on your internet.
Click DNS.
steps.description: Erase it (it will come back when you don't want to play on the server anymore).

steps.headline: Go on Clash of Clans.
steps.description: As soon as you enter, it will say downloading content. When it is done, a blue and red skull logo will come and then it will say: DARK$OULS Server - you get to choose what loot amounts you want.

text: Go to settings and go on Wi-fi and click the blue i button on your internet.  Click DNS. Erase it (it will come back when you don't want to play on the server anymore). Put in this IP address: 151.80.175.199.  Go on Clash of Clans. As soon as you enter, it will say downloading content. When it is done, a blue and red skull logo will come and then it will say: DARK$OULS Server - you get to choose what loot amounts you want.
sentences: Go to settings and go on Wi-fi and click the blue i button on your internet.
Erase it (it will come back when you don't want to play on the server anymore).
As soon as you enter, it will say downloading content.
When it is done, a blue and red skull logo will come and then it will say: DARK$OULS Server - you get to choose what loot amounts you want.
